history.proof: intros X uc_Kdenote_X. unfold upwards_closed_Kdenote in *. unfold boxp. intros m m' Hleq Hbox. intros n Hrel. qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: transitivity. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment worlds : Type R1 : KI.Relation worlds po_R1 : PreOrder KI.Krelation R2 : Relation worlds ukmM : UpwardsClosedOrderedKripkeModel worlds X : Ensemble worlds uc_Kdenote_X : forall n m : worlds, n <= m -> X n -> X m m, m' : worlds Hleq : m <= m' Hbox : forall n : worlds, Krelation m n -> X n n : worlds Hrel : Krelation m' n Unable to unify "X m'" with "X n".
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

original: intros X uc_Kdenote_X. unfold upwards_closed_Kdenote in *. unfold boxp. intros m m' Hleq Hbox. intros n Hrel. apply uc_Kdenote_X with (n:=n) (m:=m'). - transitivity m; auto. - apply Hbox. auto.
